title: Unleashing the Possibilities for Children in Foster Care
itunes:author: Guest: Ryan Bomberger
itunes:summary:
Ryan Bomberger, founder of The Radiance Foundation, reveals important research on abortion, dispels myths about adoption, and explains why more people should explore adoption from foster care. The discussion also promotes ways to support other adoptive families.


A child placed in foster care are uprooted from the only life that child has ever known. Your support today will not only support our Wait No More Foster Care and Adoption program efforts, but you’ll also offer a waiting child something comforting that they can call their own: http://focusonthefamily.com/don-daily-broadcast-product-2022-11-01?refcd=1507601


Get more episode resources: http://www.focusonthefamily.com/episodes/broadcast/unleashing-the-possibilities-for-children-in-foster-care/#featured-resource-cta


If you've listened to any of our podcasts, please give us your feedback: https://focusonthefamily.com/podcastsurvey/
